column1: Funeral service will be at 1:00 P.M. on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at Bowlin-Cantriel Funeral Home with burial at Gamble Cemetery. Visitation will be held from 11:00-1:00 P.M. on Tuesday
column5: 2015 at Bowlin-Cantriel Funeral Home. Memorials are suggested to The Family of LeRoy Dorsey Sr. c/o the funeral home. Arrangements are under the direction of Bowlin-Cantriel Funeral Services.
